summary: British Airways (BA) is the UK's second-largest airline, based in London. It was formed in 1974 by merging four airlines and was privatized in 1987. BA is part of the International Airlines Group (IAG), created in 2011 with the merger of BA and Iberia. IAG is one of the world's largest airline groups. BA is known for its route between New York and London, which generated over $1 billion in revenue. It is also a founding member of the Oneworld airline alliance, which is the third-largest global airline alliance.
title: British Airways
